basics.name: Tony Long
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

work.company: College of Tropical Agriculture and Human Resources
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official website.
Assist with internal reporting to ensure fluidity of communication between department and stakeholders.
Help manage and clean computer labs.
Assist with managing company websites and run periodic ada checks.
Help create and upload Ted-Ed lessons of various professors for various subjects.
Mans the online IT help desk for official CLT website.
Maintain, expand and integrate data from various back-end services and databases.
Design, code, and debug applications specifically in ReactJs
Create website layout/user interfaces with standard HTML/CSS practices

volunteer.summary: Managed club funds, fundraisers and volunteered in many events
highlights: Manage fundraisers along with other officers for charities or clubs.
Volunteered approx. 150 cumulative hours helping at various events such as clean ups and parades.
Manage and report club funds to advisor.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Regent Donald Chang Won Kim Scholarship Recipient
awards.summary: The purpose of this fund is to provide scholarships to full-time undergraduate students at the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa who are in need of financial assistance. Funds may be used for tuition, books, and other expenses related to the attainment of a degree in Engineering. Preference shall be given to graduates of a Hawaii high school

awards.title: Lions Young Leaders in Service award
awards.summary: In recognition of providing 50 hours of community service in a twelve month period.

awards.title: Lions Young Leaders in Service award
awards.summary: In recognition of providing 100 hours of community service in a twelve month period.
